GR14krdipc_u:796: uktaṃ ca mahadbhiḥ jagat-pālinīty ādyāḥ proktās tāḥ sthitaye kalā iti tasya svāmī nāyaka ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.18 //
GR14krdipc_u:799: athavā vraja-yuvatīnāṃ dayitāya juhomi māṃ madīyam
GR14krdipc_u:800: apīty arpayet samastaṃ brahmaṇi sugaṇe samasta-sampattyai // Krd_2.19 //
GR14krdipc_u:801: gopī-jano gopāṅganā-janas tasya vallabho niratiśaya-prema-viṣayaḥ tasmai vraja-yuvatīnāṃ gopa-ramaṇīnāṃ dayitāya hṛdayānanda-dāyine svāhā juhomi /
GR14krdipc_u:802: kiṃ māṃ svātmānaṃ madīyam api ātmīya-suhṛd-ādikam api ity anena prakāreṇa sa-guṇe brahmaṇi saṃsāra-pravartake parameśvareśvare sarvaṃ samarpayet /
GR14krdipc_u:805: aṣṭādaśākṣara-mantroddhārāya tad-antarbhūtau kṛṣṇa-govinda-śabdau prathamato vivicya darśayati-kṛṣ-śabda iti /
GR14krdipc_u:816: kṛṣ sattāyām ity atra kvib-antaḥ sattā-vācaka iti kāścit /
GR14krdipc_u:817: kṛṭ ṇaś ca ṇa-kāraś ca ānandātmaka ānanda-vācī /
GR14krdipc_u:818: nanda ānanda iti dhātor eka-deśa-grahaṇād iti kaścit /
GR14krdipc_u:819: tato dvandve kṛte 'trādarśaṃ ādyaci-kṛte ca kṛṣṇaḥ sad-ānanda ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:820: prakārāntareṇa kṛṣṇa-śabdaṃ vyutpādayati bhakteti bhaktānām agha-karṣaṇāt pāpa-parimārjanāt kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:821: bhaktādi-karṣaṇād iti pāṭhe ādi-śabdenābhakta-grahaṇaṃ bhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ sva-sthāna-nayanam abhaktasya karṣaṇaṃ naraka-nayanam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:823: kṛṣṇa-varṇa-śarīratvāt kṛṣṇaḥ mantramaya-śarīrasya vācya-vācakayor abhedena vivakṣayā /
GR14krdipc_u:826: go-śabdasya vācakatvāt jñāna-vācakatvāt tena jñānenopalabhyate prāpyate jñāyate iti govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:827: vid lābhe ity asya dhātoḥ prakārāntaram āha-vettīti /
GR14krdipc_u:830: gāṃ śabda-rāśiṃ śabda-samudāyaṃ mātṛkāṃ vettīti govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:832: athavā gāva indriyāṇi teṣāṃ vicāraṇād viśeṣeṣu prati-niyata-viṣayeṣu pravartanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:834: tathā ca śrutiḥ-paśavo div-pādaś catuṣpādaś ca iti /
GR14krdipc_u:835: teṣāṃ viśeṣeṣu puṇya-pāpeṣu cāraṇāt pravartanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:836: athavā, gāvaḥ paśu-viśeṣāḥ teṣāṃ rakṣanād govindaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:844_0: ete abhikhye nāmanī kṛṣṇa-govindākhye anukrameṇa turya-vibhaktyā pratyekaṃ caturthī-vibhaktyā
GR14krdipc_u:844_1: saha mantrāt pūrvokta-daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrād ādau manmatha-bījāt paścāt kāma-bījānantaram
GR14krdipc_u:844_2: atha ced yadi syātāṃ bhavataḥ tadā eṣo 'ṣṭādaśārṇo mantra-śreṣṭho bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:845: etasya balād eva daśākṣare 'pi kāma-bīja-sāhityaṃ kecid icchanti /
GR14krdipc_u:852: pūrva-pradiṣṭe muni-devate 'sya chandas tu gāyatram uśanti santaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:853: aṅgāni mantrārṇa-catuṣkair varmāvasānāni yugārṇam astram // Krd_2.23 //
GR14krdipc_u:854: asya mantrasya pūrva-pradiṣṭe prathama-mantra-sambandhitayā kathite muni-devate boddhavye /
GR14krdipc_u:856: aṅgānīti mantrārṇa-catuś catuṣkair mantra-sambandhi-varṇānāṃ caturbhiś caturbhir akṣaraiḥ kṛtvā ṣoḍaśākṣarair varmāvasānāni kavacāntāni catvāry aṅgāni bhavanti /
GR14krdipc_u:857: avaśiṣṭaṃ yugārṇam varṇa-dvayam astrākhyam aṅgaṃ bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:858: prayogaś ca-klīṃ kṛṣṇāya hṛdayāya namaḥ govindāya śirase svāhā,
GR14krdipc_u:864: bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaś cāpi pūrvavad amuṣya /
GR14krdipc_u:865: pūrvatarasya manorathaṃ kathayāmi nyāsam akhila-siddhi-karam // Krd_2.24 //
GR14krdipc_u:866: amuṣyāsya mantrasya bījaṃ śaktiḥ prakṛtir viniyogaḥ pūrva-mantre yāni bījādīni kathitāni tāny atrāpi jñātavyānīty arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:867: pūrvatarasyeti athānantaraṃ pūrvatarasya manor daśākṣara-gopāla-mantrasyākhila-siddhi-karaṃ samasta-siddhi-dāyakaṃ nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti pratijñā // KrdC_2.24 //
GR14krdipc_u:874: atho 'nantaraṃ budhena paṇḍitena varṇair mūla-mantrākṣarair nyāso vidheyaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:875: kiṃ kṛtvā ? mūla-mantraṃ hastayor antar madhye tathā hastayor eva bāhye pṛṣṭhe tathā hastayor eva pārśve vyāpayya vyāpakatayā vinyasyety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:880: bindūttaṃsair binduḥ śiro 'laṅkāro yeṣāṃ te tathā sānusvārair ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:882: hārda-hṛdyair hārdena namaḥ-padena hṛdyair manojñaiḥ sahitair ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:883: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ oṃ namaḥ dakṣāṅguṣṭha-parva-traye oṃ pīṃ oṃ namaḥ tarjanyām ity ādi /
GR14krdipc_u:884: oṃ llaṃ oṃ namo vāma-kaniṣṭhikāyām ity ādi // KrdC_2.25 //
GR14krdipc_u:888: śākhāsu trīṇi parvāṇy adhi daśasu pṛthag-dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:889: vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ nyasatu vimala-dhīḥ sṛṣṭir uktā karasthā /
GR14krdipc_u:891: dakṣāṅguṣṭhāntikaitat trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ ca kāryam // Krd_2.26 //
GR14krdipc_u:892: daśasu śākhāsu aṅgulīṣu pṛthak kṛtvaikaṃ trīṇi parvāṇi adhi parva-trayaṃ vyāpya,
GR14krdipc_u:893: tripāṭhinas tu trīṇi parvāṇi iti parva-traye adhīti upari aṅguly-agre ca pṛthag ekaikaśaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:894: tathā ca prathama-parvaṇi oṃ dvitīye oṃ tṛtīye oṃ aṅguly-agre namaḥ iti evam anyatrāpīty āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:895: dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭha-pūrvaṃ prathama-nyāsādau yathā syāt tathā vāmāṅgaṣṭhāvasānaṃ vāmāṅgaṣṭho 'vasāne nyāsānte yathā syād evaṃ viśada-dhīr vimala-buddhīr nyasatu /
GR14krdipc_u:896: evaṃ ca karasthā sṛṣṭir uktā kare sṛṣṭi-nyāsa-prakāra ukta ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:897_1: vinyasya vāma-kare 'py aṅguṣṭhādika-niṣṭhāsv aṅguliṣu nyased ayaṃ sthiti-nyāsa uktaḥ / saṃhṛtir
GR14krdipc_u:898: vāma-pūrvā dakṣeti saṃhṛtiḥ saṃhāraḥ vāmāṅguṣṭha-pūrvā dakṣiṇāṅguṣṭhāvasānā ayaṃ ca saṃhāra-nyāsa uktaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:899: etat trayam api sṛṣṭi-sthiti-saṃhārātmakaṃ trayam api sṛjati sthity-upetaṃ kāryaṃ ca sṛṣṭy-ādi-nyāsa-pañcakaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.26 //
GR14krdipc_u:903: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tathā vidhiḥ samīritaḥ kare // Krd_2.27 //
GR14krdipc_u:904: tatas tad-anantaraṃ sthiti-kramāt sthiti-nyāsa-krameṇa daśasv aṅgulīṣu budhaḥ paṇḍitaḥ daśāṅgakāni pūrvokta-mantra-daśāṅgāni vinyaset /
GR14krdipc_u:905: tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ tatheti tathā tena prakāreṇa sthiti-krameṇa tad-aṅga-pañcakaṃ purvokta-pañcakaṃ pūrvoktāṅga-pañcakaṃ daśasu aṅgulīṣu vinyaset /
GR14krdipc_u:907: evaṃ cāyaṃ vidhiḥ prakāraḥ kare hasta-dvaye samīritaḥ kathita ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.27 //
GR14krdipc_u:909: mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣaṃ darśayan tattva-nyāsaṃ ca krameṇāha-puṭitair iti /
GR14krdipc_u:914_0: athāntara-manunā daśārṇena puṭitair mātṛkākṣaraiḥ sa-bindubhiḥ sānusvāraiḥ purovat
GR14krdipc_u:914_1: pūrvavad yathā pūrvaṃ lalāṭādiṣu nyāsa evam abhivinyasya anu paścān mātṛkā-nyāsa-viśeṣa-karaṇānantaraṃ
GR14krdipc_u:917: tatrāha-saṃhṛti-sṛṣṭi-mārga-bhedāt prathamaṃ saṃhāra-krameṇa tad-anantaraṃ sṛṣṭi-krameṇety arthaḥ // KrdC_2.28 //
GR14krdipc_u:924: asau manu-varyaḥ manu-śreṣṭhaḥ saṃhṛtau saṃhāra-nyāse anugato yathaivāsti tathaiva sṛṣṭi-mārge sṛṣṭi-kara-nyāse pratiyāto bhavet tad-viparīto bhavet /
GR14krdipc_u:926: eṣāṃ tattvānāṃ khalu niścayena uddhṛtir uddhāraḥ pūrvoktavad yathā pūrvam ukta-tattva-nyāse /
GR14krdipc_u:927: naty-upetaṃ bhūyaḥ parāya ca tad-āhvayam ātmane ca naty-antam uddharatu tattva-manūn krameṇa iti prakāreṇety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:928: adhunā nyāsaṃ kathayāmīti sāmprataṃ nyāsa-sambandhi-tattva-nāma-kathanaṃ tat-sthāna-kathanaṃ ca karomīty arthaḥ // KrdC_2.29 //
GR14krdipc_u:932: punaḥ prakṛti-puruṣau para imāni tattvāny atha /
GR14krdipc_u:933: padāndhu-hṛdayāsyakāny adhi tu pañca madhye dvayaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:934: trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ tato nyasatu tad-viparyāsataḥ // Krd_2.30 //
GR14krdipc_u:943: paraś ca imāni pṛthivy-ādīni tattvāni tattva-pada-vācyāni /
GR14krdipc_u:951: adhi saptamy-arthe madhye hṛdaye tattva-dvayaṃ trayaṃ sakala-gaṃ sakalāṅga-vyāpakaṃ tatas tad-anantaraṃ tad-viparyāsataḥ ukta-saṃhāra-viparīta-rītyā nyasatu /
GR14krdipc_u:952_0: prayogaś ca-oṃ goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ iti pāda-dvaye ity ārabhya oṃ
GR14krdipc_u:952_1: hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane namaḥ ity antaḥ saṃhāraḥ oṃ hāṃ namaḥ parāya paramātmane
GR14krdipc_u:953: goṃ namaḥ parāya pṛthivy-ātmane namaḥ pāda-dvaye iti sṛṣṭi-nyāsaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:957: kecit tu tattva-padāntar-bhāvena nyāsam icchanti tac cintyam // KrdC_2.30 //
GR14krdipc_u:961: kāryo 'nyṣv api sadbhir gopāla-manuṣu jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai // Krd_2.31 //
GR14krdipc_u:962: ayaṃ proktaḥ kathito nyāsaḥ sadbhiḥ paṇḍitaiḥ anyeṣv api gopāla-mantreṣu uddhṛta-daśākṣara-vyatirikteṣv api kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:965: tattva-daśaka-parikptaḥ tattvānāṃ daśakaṃ tattva-daśakaṃ tena parikpta udghāṭita ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:966: kim artham ? jhaṭiti phala-siddhyai śīghra-phala-prāptyai // KrdC_2.31 //
GR14krdipc_u:973_0: athānantaraṃ dorbhyāṃ hastābhyāṃ dhruva-puṭitam praṇava-puṭitaṃ manu-varaṃ mantra-śreṣṭhaṃ
GR14krdipc_u:973_1: daśākṣaraṃ gopāla-mantram ākeśād āpādaṃ keśādi-pāda-paryantaṃ triśaḥ sva-dehe vinyased
GR14krdipc_u:974: eteṣāṃ mata ākeśād āpādad iti pāṭhaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:978: mūrdhni cakṣuṣor ubhaya-netre ekam evākṣaraṃ śrutayoḥ karṇayoḥ atrāpy -ekam eva ghrāṇe nāsā-yugme tatrāpy ekam eva mukhaṃ hṛdayaṃ jaṭharaṃ śivaṃ liṅgam jānu-dvaye ekaṃ,
GR14krdipc_u:979: pāda-dvaye ekam eteṣu daśasu sthāneṣu daśākṣarāṇi
GR14krdipc_u:982: uktā sṛṣṭiḥ śiṣṭair eṣā sthitir api
GR14krdipc_u:985: viracayec ca sṛṣṭim anu sthitim // Krd_2.33 //
GR14krdipc_u:986: śiṣṭair āgama-jñair eṣā sṛṣṭir uktety arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:987: sthitir api sthiti-nyāso 'pi munibhir nāradādibhir hṛdayādi-mukhāntikā abhihitā hṛdayam ārabhya mukha-paryantaṃ kathitā /
GR14krdipc_u:989: tatra mantrākṣarāṇi pratilomena deyānītīdaṃ tritayaṃ viracayatu anu paścād etat tritaya-karaṇānantaraṃ punaḥ sṛṣṭim sthitim ca viracayatu /
GR14krdipc_u:990: tathā ca pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:991: prayogas tu goṃ namaḥ pīṃ namaḥ ity ādi //33//
GR14krdipc_u:993: yeṣām āśramiṇāṃ yad-anto nyāsas tad darśayati -nyāsa iti /
GR14krdipc_u:995: sthity-anto gṛhamedhiṣu sṛṣṭy-anto varṇinām iti prāhuḥ // Krd_2.34 //
GR14krdipc_u:996: ayaṃ nyāsaḥ maskari-vaikhānaseṣu saṃhārānto vihitaḥ maskarī sannyāsī vaikhānaso vānaprasthaḥ,
GR14krdipc_u:997: tathā tābhyāṃ nyāsa-trayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:998: gṛha-medhiṣu gṛhastheṣu ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sthity-anto vihitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:999: tathā gṛhasthaiḥ pañca nyāsāḥ kāryā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1000: varṇināṃ brahmacāriṇām ayaṃ nyāsaḥ sṛṣṭy-anto vihitaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1001: tathā ca brahmacāribhir nyāsa-catuṣṭayaṃ kāryam ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1002: iti pūrvoktam artha-jātaṃ prāhuḥ prācīnā āgamajñā iti śeṣaḥ // KrdC_2.34 //
GR14krdipc_u:1005: vairāgya-yuji gṛhasthe saṃhāraṃ kecid āhur ācāryāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1006: sahajānau vana-vāsini sthitiṃ ca vidyārthināṃ sṛṣṭim // Krd_2.35 //
GR14krdipc_u:1007: kecid ācāryāḥ vairāgya-yukta-gṛhasthe saṃhārāntaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1008: kiṃ ca sahajānau vana-vāsini sapatnīke sthitiṃ sthity-antaṃ nyāsam āhuḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1009: tathā brahmacāri-bhinnānāṃ vidyārthinām api sṛṣṭim sṛṣṭy-antaṃ nyāsam āhur ity arthaḥ // KrdC_2.35 //
GR14krdipc_u:1014: nasi ca vadane sarvāḥ sajyāyasī hṛdi tarjanī
GR14krdipc_u:1015: prathamaja-yutā madhyā nābhau śravo-vihitā śive // Krd_2.36 //
GR14krdipc_u:1016: tā evāṅgulayo jānvoḥ sāṅguṣṭhās tu pada-dvaye /
GR14krdipc_u:1017: sthānārṇayor vinimayo bhaven nāsty aṅguli-sthānayoḥ // Krd_2.37 //
GR14krdipc_u:1018: madhyā madhyāṅguliḥ śirasi mūrdhni vihitā nyāsa-karaṇatvena tathā madhyāṅgulyā nyāsaḥ śirasi kārya ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1020: tathā ca madhyamā-tarjanībhyām akṣṇor nyāsaḥ kāryaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1021: śravasi śrotra-yugale rahitāṅguṣṭhā aṅguṣṭha-rahitā sarvāṅgulayo vihitāḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1022: nasi nāsā-yugale jyeṣṭhānvitā aṅguṣṭha-yuktā upakaniṣṭhakā anāmikā vihitā /
GR14krdipc_u:1025: nābhau jaṭhare nābhi-padena jaṭharam upalakṣitam iti vidyādharaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1028: śive liṅge tathā vihitā yathā jaṭhare sāṅguṣṭhā madhyā
GR14krdipc_u:1030: śravo vihitā śiva iti pāṭhe śrotra-yugale yā aṅguṣṭha-rahitās tāḥ śive vihitā ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1031: jānvos tā evāṅgulayaḥ aṅguṣṭhena rahitāḥ sarvāṅgulaya ity arthaḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1033: sthānārṇayor ity ādinā sthānaākṣaraayor vinimayo viparyayo bhavati /
GR14krdipc_u:1038: kintu sṛṣṭau sthitau saṃhṛtau vā yatra sthāne yāṅgulir vihitā tayaivāṅgulyā tatra stāne nyāsaḥ kārya ity arthaḥ / // KrdC_2.36-37 //
GR14krdipc_u:1043: aparaṃ bhūty-abhidhaṃ bhūtir iti nāma yasya tad bhūti-nāmakaṃ vacmi kathayāmi /
GR14krdipc_u:1053: tat-prācyādi-diśāsu mūrdhni sakale doṣṇoś ca sakthnos tathā // Krd_2.39 //
GR14krdipc_u:1062: kandharā ghāṭā kandharā kaṇṭha iti laghu-dīpikā-kāraḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1074: na iti nāsikā-dvayaṃ kapola-dvayam eteṣu tṛtīyā vṛttiḥ /
GR14krdipc_u:1075: kara-padeti kara-padayoḥ pratyekaṃ sandhi-catuṣṭayaṃ sandhiṣv aṅguly-agreṣu aṅgulīṣu ca /
